description.sun-moon:
The user attacks by beating the target with a
bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower
the target’s Defense stat.

The user attacks by beating the target with a
bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower
the target’s Defense stat.

bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower
the target’s Defense stat.
description.sword-shield:
The user attacks by beating the target with a
bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower
the target’s Defense stat.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
effect.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
